title: Introducing: LOVA
body:
Photo: Fredrik Hvass

Scandinavia is once again pumping out a whole host of exciting new popstars, with the likes of Sigrid, Tove Styrke and Dagny all set to leave a serious impression on 2018.

Another name to add to that ever building list of emerging artists from Northern Europe is nineteen year old **LOVA** aka Lova Alvilde. Having come through the ranks of Stockholm’s Rytmus Music School which counts Tove Lo and Robyn as alumni, her debut single, _You Me and the Silence_ is the sort of character driven off-kilter pop that we’ve come to expect from Swedish upstarts in recent years. A high energy listen that just gets better with every listen. Check it out below.
